FuncDef: This command specifies an alternative path that the LSP uses if the primary path is not available. This command is optional and is not required if theconfig router mpls lsplsp-nameprimarypath-namecommand is specified. After the switch over from the primary to the secondary, the system continuously tries to revert to the primary path. The switch back to the primary path is based on theretry-timerinterval.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the case-sensitive alphanumeric name label for the LSP path up to 32 characters in length.
